md:MDSlide.pre: # HTML5 Rocks ## It all started with a presentation * [http://slides.html5rocks.com](http://slides.html5rocks.com) * Demonstrates the coming HTML5 features * Created by [Marcin Wichary](mailto:mwichary@google.com), enhanced by the [Chrome DevRel](mailto:chrome-devrel@googlegroups.com) Team, [Alex Russell](mailto:slightlyoff@chromium.org) and Brad Neuberg

# GWT HTML5 Rocks ## [Sfeir](http://www.sfeir.com) ported *HTML5 Rocks* to GWT * [http://gwthtml5.appspot.com](http://gwthtml5.appspot.com) * Shows that GWT developers can benefit from HTML5 support * Done by [Salvador Diaz](mailto:diaz.s@sfeir.com), [Vincent Bostoen](mailto:bostoen.v@sfeir.com), [Patrice de Saint Steban](mailto:desaintsteban.p@sfeir.com) and [Christophe Phu](mailto:phu.c@sfeir.com)

# GWT Training ## [Excilys](https://www.excilys.com) modified it for a GWT training * [http://gwt.formation.excilys.com](http://gwt.formation.excilys.com) * HTML4 compatible, chapters, nice URLs, show notes, syntax highlighting * Done by [Mathieu Boniface](mailto:mboniface@excilys.com), [Pierre Merienne](mailto:pmerienne@excilys.com) and [Pierre-Yves Ricau](mailto:py.ricau@gmail.com)

# A modern CV ## [Pierre-Yves Ricau](http://twitter.com/piwai) modified it for his CV * [http://cv.piwai.info](http://cv.piwai.info) * Google Analytics (one page per slide), header quick links, and many bug fixes

# Rockslide ## Time for a standard solution * Cleaner code, mavenised & modularised * Many [features](#Features)! * Created by [Pierre-Yves Ricau](mailto:py.ricau@gmail.com) * Enhanced by [you](http://github.com/pyricau/rockslide/issues)?

# Sources of inspiration ## Other **code** based presentation frameworks * [Slippy](http://slides.seld.be/?file=2010-05-30+Example.html) * [deck.js](http://imakewebthings.github.com/deck.js) * Rockslide is named after [Landslide](http://github.com/adamzap/landslide)
